00036 UIBibleStudyWidget::UIBibleStudyWidget(boost::shared_ptr<TranslationManager> translation_manager, boost::shared_ptr<const BibleDatabase::TranslationLoader> translation_loader) :
00037     m_translation_manager(translation_manager),
00038     m_translation_loader(translation_loader),
00039     m_translation_load_timer(new QTimer),
00040     m_translation_load_timeout_ms(500),
00041     m_results_model(new SearchResultsModel(translation_manager)),
00042     m_starred_verses_model(new StarredVersesModel(translation_manager)),
00043     m_browse_verses_model(new BrowseVersesModel(translation_manager)),
00044     m_dummy_central_widget(new QWidget(this)),
00045     m_tabs(new QTabWidget()),
00046     m_search(new UISearchWidget(translation_manager)),
00047     m_results(new UISearchResultsWidget(m_results_model)),
00048     m_starred_verses(new UIStarredVersesWidget(m_starred_verses_model)),
00049     m_text(new UITextViewWidget(translation_manager, m_starred_verses_model)),
00050     m_browse(new UIBrowseVersesWidget(m_browse_verses_model)),
00051     m_exit_action(new QAction(tr("E&xit"), this)),
00052     m_about_action(new QAction(tr("&About"), this))
00053 {
00054     this->setWindowIcon(QIcon(QString(":/icons/BibleStudy.ico")));
00055 
00056     this->connect_signals();
00057     this->set_font();
00058     this->initialize_widgets();
00059     this->initialize_status_bar();
00060     this->initialize_actions();
00061 
00062     m_translation_load_timer->start(m_translation_load_timeout_ms);
00063 }

00065 void UIBibleStudyWidget::connect_signals()
00066 {
00067     // Translation loading connections
00068     QT_CONNECT(m_translation_load_timer, SIGNAL(timeout()), this, SLOT(load_translations()));
00069     QT_CONNECT(this, SIGNAL(translations_loaded()), m_search, SLOT(display_translation_check_boxes()));
00070     QT_CONNECT(this, SIGNAL(translations_loaded()), m_browse, SLOT(set_browse_verses_model()));
00071 
00072     // UISearchWidget connections
00073     QT_CONNECT(m_search, SIGNAL(search_started(QString)), this, SLOT(display_search_status_bar_message(QString)));
00074     QT_CONNECT(m_search, SIGNAL(search_complete(boost::shared_ptr<BibleDatabase::ISearchResults>)), m_results, SLOT(display_search_results(boost::shared_ptr<BibleDatabase::ISearchResults>)));
00075     QT_CONNECT(m_search, SIGNAL(search_complete(boost::shared_ptr<BibleDatabase::ISearchResults>)), this, SLOT(raise_results()));
00076     QT_CONNECT(m_search, SIGNAL(search_complete(boost::shared_ptr<BibleDatabase::ISearchResults>)), this, SLOT(pop_status_bar_message()));
00077 
00078     // UITextViewWidget connections
00079     QT_CONNECT(m_text, SIGNAL(verse_starred(boost::shared_ptr<BibleDatabase::VerseDisplay>)), m_starred_verses, SLOT(add_starred_verse(boost::shared_ptr<BibleDatabase::VerseDisplay>)));
00080     QT_CONNECT(m_text, SIGNAL(verse_starred(boost::shared_ptr<BibleDatabase::VerseDisplay>)), this, SLOT(raise_starred_verses()));
00081     QT_CONNECT(m_text, SIGNAL(verse_unstarred(boost::shared_ptr<BibleDatabase::VerseDisplay>)), m_starred_verses, SLOT(remove_starred_verse(boost::shared_ptr<BibleDatabase::VerseDisplay>)));
00082 
00083     // UISearchResultsWidget connections
00084     QT_CONNECT(m_results, SIGNAL(verse_display_changed(boost::shared_ptr<BibleDatabase::VerseDisplay>)), m_text, SLOT(display_text(boost::shared_ptr<BibleDatabase::VerseDisplay>)));
00085     QT_CONNECT(m_results, SIGNAL(results_filter_started(QString)), this, SLOT(display_search_results_filter_status_bar_message(QString)));
00086     QT_CONNECT(m_results, SIGNAL(results_filter_completed()), this, SLOT(pop_status_bar_message()));
00087 
00088     // UIBrowseVersesWidget connections
00089     QT_CONNECT(m_browse, SIGNAL(verse_display_changed(boost::shared_ptr<BibleDatabase::VerseDisplay>)), m_text, SLOT(display_text(boost::shared_ptr<BibleDatabase::VerseDisplay>)));
00090 
00091     // UIStarredVersesWidget connections
00092     QT_CONNECT(m_starred_verses, SIGNAL(verse_display_changed(boost::shared_ptr<BibleDatabase::VerseDisplay>)), m_text, SLOT(display_text(boost::shared_ptr<BibleDatabase::VerseDisplay>)));
00093 }

00095 void UIBibleStudyWidget::set_font()
00096 {
00097     QFont app_font = QApplication::font();
00098     app_font.setPointSize(12);
00099     app_font.setFamily("Bitstream Vera Sans");
00100     QApplication::setFont(app_font);
00101 }

00103 void UIBibleStudyWidget::initialize_widgets()
00104 {
00105     m_tabs->addTab(m_browse, tr("&Verse Browser"));
00106     m_tabs->addTab(m_results, tr("Search &Results"));
00107     m_tabs->addTab(m_starred_verses, tr("&Starred Verses"));
00108 
00109     QHBoxLayout* bottom_row = new QHBoxLayout();
00110     bottom_row->addWidget(m_tabs);
00111     bottom_row->addWidget(m_text);
00112 
00113     QVBoxLayout* mainLayout = new QVBoxLayout();
00114     mainLayout->addWidget(m_search);
00115     mainLayout->addLayout(bottom_row);
00116 
00117     m_dummy_central_widget->setLayout(mainLayout);
00118     
00119     this->setCentralWidget(m_dummy_central_widget);
00120 }

00122 void UIBibleStudyWidget::initialize_status_bar()
00123 {
00124     this->push_status_bar_message(tr("Ready (Version ") + QString(VERSION ")"));

00127 void UIBibleStudyWidget::initialize_actions()
00128 {
00129     m_exit_action->setShortcuts(QKeySequence::Close);
00130     m_exit_action->setStatusTip(tr("Exit the BibleStudy"));
00131     connect(m_exit_action, SIGNAL(triggered()), this, SLOT(close()));
00132 
00133     m_about_action->setStatusTip(tr("Show the BibleStudy's About box"));
00134     connect(m_about_action, SIGNAL(triggered()), this, SLOT(about()));
00135 }

00137 void UIBibleStudyWidget::raise_results()

00139     m_tabs->setCurrentWidget(m_results);
00140 }

00142 void UIBibleStudyWidget::raise_starred_verses()

00152 void UIBibleStudyWidget::display_search_status_bar_message(QString search_text)
00153 {
00154     this->push_status_bar_message(tr("Searching for ") + search_text);

00157 void UIBibleStudyWidget::display_search_results_filter_status_bar_message(QString filter_text)
00158 {
00159     if (!filter_text.isEmpty())
00160     {
00161         this->push_status_bar_message(tr("Filtering search results based on ") + filter_text);
00162     }
00163     else
00164     {
00165         this->push_status_bar_message(tr("Removing search results filter"));
00166     }
00167 }
00168 
00169 void UIBibleStudyWidget::push_status_bar_message(QString message)
00170 {
00171     m_status_bar_messages.push(message);
00172     this->statusBar()->showMessage(message);
00173 }
00174 
00175 void UIBibleStudyWidget::pop_status_bar_message()
00176 {
00177     if (!m_status_bar_messages.empty())
00178     {
00179         m_status_bar_messages.pop();
00180         this->statusBar()->showMessage(m_status_bar_messages.top());
00181     }
00182     else
00183     {
00184         this->statusBar()->clearMessage();
00185     }
00186 }
00187 
00188 void UIBibleStudyWidget::load_translations()
00189 {
00190     m_translation_load_timer->stop();
00191 
00192 #ifdef LINUX
00193     TranslationLoadInformation dr_load_information = {"Douay-Rheims", "../share/BibleStudy/Translations/DR.buf" };
00194     TranslationLoadInformation kjv_load_information = {"King James Version", "../share/BibleStudy/Translations/KJV.buf" };
00195 #else
00196     TranslationLoadInformation dr_load_information = {"Douay-Rheims", "Translations/DR.buf" };
00197     TranslationLoadInformation kjv_load_information = {"King James Version", "Translations/KJV.buf" };
00198 #endif
00199     
00200     m_translations_to_load.push_back(dr_load_information);
00201     m_translations_to_load.push_back(kjv_load_information);
00202 
00203     if (!m_translations_to_load.empty())
00204     {
00205         this->setEnabled(false);
00206         start_next_translation_load();
00207     }
00208 }
00209 
00210 void UIBibleStudyWidget::translation_loaded()
00211 {
00212     QT_DISCONNECT(m_load_translation_worker.get(), SIGNAL(finished()), this, SLOT(translation_loaded()));
00213 
00214     boost::shared_ptr<CommandLoadTranslation> command_load_translation = boost::dynamic_pointer_cast<CommandLoadTranslation>(m_command_load_translation);
00215     boost::shared_ptr<const Translation> translation = command_load_translation->get_translation();
00216     m_translation_manager->add_translation(translation);
00217     this->pop_status_bar_message();
00218 
00219     if (!m_translations_to_load.empty())
00220     {
00221         start_next_translation_load();
00222     }
00223     else
00224     {
00225         this->setEnabled(true);
00226         emit translations_loaded();
00227     }
00228 }
00229 
00230 void UIBibleStudyWidget::start_next_translation_load()
00231 {
00232     TranslationLoadInformation load_information = m_translations_to_load.front();
00233     m_translations_to_load.pop_front();
00234 
00235     this->push_status_bar_message(tr("Loading translation ") + tr(load_information.translation_long_name.c_str()));
00236     m_command_load_translation = boost::shared_ptr<ICommand>(new CommandLoadTranslation(m_translation_loader, load_information.translation_file));
00237     m_load_translation_worker = boost::make_shared<BackgroundWorker>(m_command_load_translation);
00238 
00239     QT_CONNECT(m_load_translation_worker.get(), SIGNAL(finished()), this, SLOT(translation_loaded()));
00240 
00241     m_load_translation_worker->start();
00242 }
